title.narrative: MINUSMA Trust Fund et controle citoyen. Programme de transition 2015-2016 3/3

description.narrative:
the new engagement implementing by "Groupe de Suivi Budgétaire" aims to support the strengthening of citizen participation in the budget process and management of public finances ". It must be improved the efficiency of public spending through increased citizen participation in the budget process (planning, budgeting, implementation, monitoring and evaluation, control) at regional and local levels and in the management of public finances including the Budget of State and local authorities Direct effect: The members of the regional and local councils, and regional and local governments formed effectively participate in the budget process.
Indicator Analysis Report produced and debated in public, which shows that participants have started to use the skills acquired
Reference Year 2015 0 Target Year 2016 5 reports (4 and 1 at the municipal level to the regional level)
Output 1: Number of members of 4 municipal councils and administration trained and able to analyze and / or advocacy and influence the budget
Reference Year 2015 0 Target Year 2016 80 (of 120 participants)
Output 2 - Number of Regional Council members and trained administration, can participate in the budget process and are able to analyze and / or advocacy and influence the budget
